lead_paragraph: The highest court in international sports won a major legal victory Tuesday when a German court rejected five-time Olympic speedskating champion Claudio Pechstein's claim for damages in a doping case that had threatened to topple the established Olympic legal system.

headline.print_headline: German Federal Court Rules Against Speedskater Pechstein
headline.main: German Federal Court Rules Against Speedskater Pechstein
